org.atmosphere.cpr
Interface AsyncSupportListener

public interface AsyncSupportListener

A listener that can be used to track AsyncSupport events like SUSPEND, RESUME, TIMEOUT, DESTROYED and CLOSED

Author:
Jeanfrancois Arcand
